name: The Oberoi Amarvilas
description: Palatial luxury resort in Agra with Taj Mahal views, Mughal-style gardens, pools, and world-class dining.

name: Umaid Bhawan Palace
description: Iconic heritage hotel in Jodhpur set in a golden 26-acre palace, world-class Indian and fusion cuisine, and royal hospitality.

name: The Oberoi Mumbai
description: Elegant hotel overlooking Marine Drive with spacious rooms, sea views, fine dining, and spa.

name: The Leela Palace New Delhi
description: Ultra-luxurious city hotel with exclusive club lounge, gourmet restaurants, and a lush garden estate.

reviews.comment: Grand architecture, the staff are amazing!

name: Taj Lake Palace Udaipur
description: Stunning 5-star palace hotel set like a jewel on Lake Pichola, renowned for its boat rides, private dining and heritage décor.

reviews.comment: The property is like a dream. Very romantic.

name: St. Regis Mumbai
description: Luxury high-rise hotel in Lower Parel offering exquisite fine dining, rooftop bars, and panoramic city views.

location.address: 462 Senapati Bapat Marg, Lower Parel, Mumbai

name: Fairfield by Marriott Goa Benaulim
description: Upscale beach resort with outdoor pools, garden views, and multiple dining options, ideal for families and couples.

reviews.comment: Loved the pool and proximity to beach.

name: The Leela Kovalam
description: Elegant seaside resort with a private beach, infinity pool, sky bar, and panoramic sunset views.

reviews.comment: Perfect R & R Holiday! Fabulous food and hospitality.

name: Trident Hyderabad
description: City hotel with largest rooms in Hyderabad, expansive city views, and excellent Italian & Indian cuisine.

reviews.comment: Excellent executive lounge and infinity pool.

name: Snow Valley Resorts Shimla
description: Family-friendly mountain resort with clean rooms, scenic views, and prime location near Mall Road.

reviews.comment: Best location near Mall Road, food yummy, clean rooms.

name: ITC Grand Chola Chennai
description: Majestic luxury hotel inspired by Chola dynasty, featuring grand architecture, multiple restaurants, and a lavish spa.

name: Radisson Blu Plaza Delhi Airport
description: Modern airport hotel with stylish rooms, spa, outdoor pool, and multiple dining options, ideal for business and leisure travelers.

reviews.comment: Very convenient for airport layovers. Great breakfast!

name: Novotel Hyderabad Convention Centre
description: Business-friendly hotel with convention facilities, outdoor pool, and international cuisine, located in Hyderabad’s tech hub.

name: JW Marriott Pune
description: Luxury hotel with rooftop dining, spa, and city views, located in Pune’s business district.

name: Vivanta Guwahati
description: Modern hotel with lush gardens, spa, and Assamese cuisine, ideal for business and leisure in Guwahati.

name: The Fern Residency Jaipur
description: Eco-friendly hotel with modern amenities, rooftop pool, and Rajasthani cuisine in Jaipur.

name: Holiday Inn Express Bengaluru
description: Smart hotel for business travelers with free breakfast, WiFi, and quick access to IT parks.

reviews.comment: Perfect for business trips, fast check-in.

name: The Gateway Hotel Varanasi
description: Riverside hotel with lush gardens, pool, and authentic Banarasi cuisine, close to the Ganges.

reviews.comment: Peaceful and close to the ghats.

name: Lemon Tree Premier Bhubaneswar
description: Contemporary hotel with vibrant interiors, rooftop pool, and multi-cuisine dining in Bhubaneswar.

name: The Park Kolkata
description: Trendy hotel with vibrant nightlife, spa, and contemporary rooms in the heart of Kolkata.

name: Hyatt Regency Chandigarh
description: Modern luxury hotel with pool, spa, and direct access to Elante Mall in Chandigarh.

reviews.comment: Loved the mall access and pool.

name: Welcomhotel Amritsar
description: Heritage-inspired hotel with lush lawns, pool, and Punjabi cuisine, close to Golden Temple.

name: Radisson Blu Resort Temple Bay Mamallapuram
description: Beachfront resort with infinity pool, golf, and spa, overlooking the Bay of Bengal.

name: Courtyard by Marriott Siliguri
description: Modern hotel with mountain views, pool, and all-day dining, gateway to North East India.

reviews.comment: Great for Darjeeling trips, nice pool.

name: The Lalit Great Eastern Kolkata
description: Historic hotel with colonial charm, spa, and bakery, located in central Kolkata.

reviews.comment: Loved the bakery and old-world feel.

name: Taj Bengal Kolkata
description: Iconic luxury hotel with grand lobby, fine dining, and lush gardens in Kolkata.

name: The Residency Towers Coimbatore
description: Upscale hotel with rooftop pool, spa, and South Indian cuisine in Coimbatore.

name: The Tamara Coorg
description: Luxury eco-resort in the hills of Coorg with plantation walks, spa, and panoramic views.

name: The Zuri Kumarakom Kerala Resort & Spa
description: Lakeside luxury resort with houseboats, spa, and Kerala cuisine in Kumarakom.

location.address: V 235 A1 to A54, Karottukayal, Kumarakom

name: The Westin Sohna Resort & Spa
description: Wellness resort with villas, spa, and adventure activities near Gurgaon.

name: Sample Hotel with Working Images
description: This is a sample hotel entry with working images for demonstration.
